data.actual_result: The Unblock button is overlapped by the typing strip which is not supposed to be there
data.expected_result: The typing strip disappears and the Unblock button is there without being overlapped
data.short_description: Blocking a user while they are typing in a DM and the typing thing appears below the chat box will make the Unblock button to send a message be overlapped by that typing strip
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone keep typing some message in your DM - Block them while they are typing - Notice the Unblock button on the bottom of the screen being overlapsed
